name: reg-mni305.2mm
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Computes the registration between the FreeSurfer MNI305 2mm space and a subject's FreeSurfer anatomical space.

inputs.description: Subject ID for the FreeSurfer anatomical space.
inputs.name: Subject ID

inputs.description: tkregister2-style registration matrix file (should have a .dat or .reg extension).
inputs.name: Registration file
